about.autoUpdateDescription: Download and install new releases automatically in the background.
about.betaProgramDescription: Receive early builds and upcoming features before everyone else.
about.description: VidBee - Free and open-source automated video downloader with RSS auto-download, batch processing, and support for 1000+ platforms.
about.followAuthorDescription: Stay updated with the latest VidBee news and updates.
about.followAuthorSupport: Follow the developer on X (Twitter) to get the latest updates and news about VidBee.

notifications.updateAvailableMessage: A new version {{version}} is available. Please download it from the official website.

about.preferencesDescription: Tune update settings without leaving this page.

resources.changelogDescription: Catch up on what changed in each version.
resources.contactDescription: Reach out directly for help or collaboration.
resources.feedbackDescription: Share ideas, report issues, or provide feedback through multiple channels.
resources.githubIssuesDescription: Report bugs or request features on GitHub.
resources.xFeedbackDescription: Share feedback or suggestions on X by mentioning @nexmoex.
resources.discordDescription: Join our Discord community for discussions and support.
resources.faqDescription: Frequently asked questions and troubleshooting guides.
resources.websiteDescription: Product highlights, roadmap, and community news.

about.resourcesDescription: Useful links to learn more about VidBee and stay connected.
about.shareDescription: Share VidBee with your community in one click.
about.shareSupport: Recommend VidBee to your friends to support our growth and updates.
about.title: About

latestVersionStatus.error: Unable to fetch the latest version

advancedOptions.downloadSubsHint: Save subtitles as separate files when available
advancedOptions.endHint: If kept empty, it will be downloaded to the end
advancedOptions.startHint: If kept empty, it will start from the beginning
advancedOptions.title: Advanced Options

app.description: Download videos and audios from hundreds of sites
app.title: VidBee

download.autoFolderHint: Automatic folders are created from metadata.
download.enterUrlDescription: Paste or type a video URL.

feedback.title: Report this error:
feedback.githubUrlTooLong: This GitHub link is very long. If it fails to open, please open the issue page and paste the logs manually.

download.oneClickDownloadDescription: Download directly with default settings without confirmation
download.oneClickDownloadTooltip: Paste & download instantly, skip the steps
download.pastePlaylistUrl: Click to paste playlist link from clipboard [Ctrl + V]
download.pasteUrl: Click to paste video URL or ID [Ctrl + V]
download.title: Title

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try reloading the application or report this issue if it persists.
error.helpText: If this error persists, please copy the error report above and share it with the support team. You can find contact information in the About page.

errors.downloadNecessaryFilesFailed: Failed to download necessary files. Please check your network and try again
errors.invalidUrl: The clipboard content is not a valid URL
errors.networkError: Some error has occurred. Check your network and use correct URL

history.confirmClearAllDescription: Remove {{count}} items from your history. Files stay on disk.
history.confirmDeleteSelectedDescription: Remove {{count}} items from your history. Files stay on disk.
history.confirmDeletePlaylistDescription: Remove {{count}} items from {{title}} and delete their files.
history.description: View and manage your download history
history.noHistoryDescription: Your completed downloads will appear here
history.cookiesTipDescription: Configure cookies to raise success rates from 70% to 99%.
history.title: Download History

notifications.downloadAlreadyQueued: This download is already in progress

playlist.description: Download all videos from a YouTube playlist or channel
playlist.noEntries: No videos were found in this playlist
playlist.noEntriesInRange: No videos in the selected range
playlist.noRangeSelected: No end set - full playlist selected
playlist.playlistUrlDescription: Download all videos from a playlist in bulk
playlist.title: Download Playlist

settings.browserForCookies: Select browser to use cookies from
settings.browserForCookiesDescription: Browser to extract cookies from for authentication. We'll try to detect a profile automatically.
settings.browserForCookiesWindowsNote: Windows only supports Firefox cookies. For other browsers, please configure a cookies file manually.
settings.browserForCookiesProfileDescription: Profile path for the browser selected above. Auto-filled when possible.
settings.browserForCookiesProfileInvalid: Profile path is not valid. Choose the profile folder for the selected browser.
settings.browserForCookiesProfileInvalidPath: That folder does not exist. Pick an existing profile folder.
settings.browserForCookiesProfileInvalidProfile: Profile name not found in the default browser location.
settings.browserForCookiesProfileInvalidUnsupport: No default profile location is known for this browser on this platform.
settings.browserForCookiesProfileInvalidEmpty: Enter a profile path for the selected browser.
settings.cookiesFileDescription: Netscape formatted cookies file to load for authentication
settings.cookiesHelpBrowser: Pick your browser above to reuse its signed-in session automatically.
settings.cookiesHelpFile: Export a Netscape cookies file (see the yt-dlp FAQ) and select it here when needed.
settings.cookiesGuideDescription: See step-by-step guidance for using cookies in VidBee.
settings.description: Configure your download preferences and application settings
settings.downloadPathDescription: Choose where to save downloaded files
settings.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application interface
settings.hideDockIconDescription: Remove VidBee from the macOS Dock. Use the menu bar or tray icon to reopen the app.
settings.launchAtLoginDescription: Open VidBee automatically after you sign in to your computer.
settings.launchAtLoginUnsupported: Auto launch is only available on macOS and Windows.
settings.enableAnalyticsDescription: Share anonymous usage data to help us understand how the app is used and prioritize improvements.
settings.embedChaptersDescription: Add chapter markers to the file when available
settings.embedMetadataDescription: Write title, artist, and other metadata when available
settings.embedSubsDescription: Embed subtitles into the video file (mp4, webm, mkv)
settings.embedThumbnailDescription: Add the thumbnail as cover art
settings.shareWatermarkDescription: Add a watermark with the original title, author, and VidBee branding
settings.oneClickDownloadDescription: Enable one-click download with default settings
settings.oneClickDownloadTypeDescription: Choose the default download type for one-click downloads. Quality uses the preset below.
settings.oneClickQualityDescription: Select the quality preset used for one-click downloads
settings.showMoreFormatsDescription: Display additional format options in the interface

subscriptionDefaults.filenameDescription: Pattern used when a subscription does not override its filename.

settings.themeDescription: Choose a light, dark, or system theme for VidBee
settings.title: Settings

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.subtitle: {{count}} subscription{{count, plural, one {} other {s}}}
subscriptions.description: Automatically monitor RSS feeds and queue new downloads without manual work.

defaults.title: Automation defaults
defaults.description: Control where subscription downloads are stored and how often VidBee checks for new videos.
defaults.onlyLatestDescription: When enabled, VidBee skips older backlog items and only grabs the newest upload.

add.title: Add RSS
add.description: Paste an RSS feed link. VidBee will detect the feed automatically.

fields.onlyLatestDescription: Ignore backlog items and fetch just the newest upload from this feed.

tooltip.notQueued: Not in the download queue yet

notifications.directoryError: Failed to open the directory picker.
notifications.missingUrl: Please paste a channel link first.
notifications.duplicateUrl: This RSS feed is already subscribed.
notifications.queueError: Failed to add to download queue.
notifications.openLinkError: Failed to open the video link.
notifications.resolveError: Failed to resolve RSS feed URL.

subscriptions.empty: No subscriptions yet. Add your favorite channels to start auto-downloading.

edit.title: Edit {{name}}
edit.description: Tweak filters, tags, and overrides for this feed.

rssHub.title: Automated Subscriptions with RSSHub
rssHub.description: Combine VidBee with RSSHub to enable automated subscriptions and downloads from various platforms. Once set up, VidBee runs in the background and automatically downloads the latest videos and content.
rssHub.hint: Don't have an RSS feed URL? Use RSSHub to generate RSS feeds for YouTube, Twitter, and thousands of other platforms.

sites.moreDescription: The complete yt-dlp list is updated constantly by the community.
sites.pageDescription: VidBee uses yt-dlp under the hood to reach hundreds of sources.
sites.pageIntro: Here are the mainstream services people download from most frequently.

bandcamp.description: Independent artist albums and community releases.
bandcamp.label: Bandcamp

dailymotion.description: Global news, sports, and entertainment clips.
dailymotion.label: Dailymotion

facebook.description: Feed, Watch, and Reels videos from public pages.
facebook.label: Facebook

instagram.description: Feed, Stories, Reels, and Highlights content.
instagram.label: Instagram

kick.description: Creator live streams and replays on the Kick platform.
kick.label: Kick

linkedin.description: Professional talks, webinars, and learning videos.
linkedin.label: LinkedIn

mixcloud.description: DJ mixes, radio shows, and long-form audio.
mixcloud.label: Mixcloud

niconico.description: Japanese animation, music, and live broadcast archive.
niconico.label: Niconico

pinterest.description: Idea pins, how-to reels, and lifestyle inspiration videos.
pinterest.label: Pinterest

reddit.description: Embedded clips and hosted videos from communities.
reddit.label: Reddit

soundcloud.description: Music tracks, playlists, and DJ sets.
soundcloud.label: SoundCloud

tiktok.description: Short-form mobile videos, effects, and live streams.
tiktok.label: TikTok

tumblr.description: Creative short-form media and fan edits.
tumblr.label: Tumblr

twitch.description: Gaming, music, and IRL live streams and VODs.
twitch.label: Twitch

twitter.description: Timeline posts, Spaces recordings, and broadcasts.
twitter.label: X (Twitter)

vimeo.description: High-quality creator and business video hosting.
vimeo.label: Vimeo

youtube.description: Long-form and livestream video from creators worldwide.
youtube.label: YouTube

youtubemusic.description: Official music videos, albums, and live performances.
youtubemusic.label: YouTube Music
